successes.title: The Killing of Tony Blair
successes.description:
"Some people make a living, others make a killing" -
an exclusive new documentary on Tony Blair which will break unexplored ground

Pledges.description: 1) Your name will APPEAR IN THE CREDITS under the special thanks section of the film.

1) You will receive a THANK YOU SHOUT OUT from George Galloway on his documentary Facebook page or from the documentary’s Twitter account. 2) Your name will appear in the credits under the special thanks section of the film.

1) You will receive an invitation to an EXCLUSIVE AND EARLY ONLINE SCREENING. 2) You will receive a thank you shout out from George Galloway on his documentary Facebook page or from the documentary’s Twitter account. 3) Your name will appear in the credits under the special thanks section of the film.
